name: StartupBuys
tag_list: small-business, networking, marketing, promotion, coupon, deals, sourcing
overview:
StartupBuys.com is a promotional, sourcing and business networking website for new, small businesses, their future customers and suppliers.

StartupBuys.com provides to startup/new small businesses in operation for, or owned by the current owner for, less than 4 years, with less than 100 employees, a cost effective web platform to:

. promote their businesses by being listed in our nationwide, local searchable, fully accessible directory of startup/new small businesses

. promote their businesses by offering their goods and services to consumers and other businesses through great coupon deals, promotions and offerings

. promote their businesses by organizing and attending relevant events

. promote their businesses by posting relevant blogs

. fulfill their business sourcing needs

. get/give business advice, share information and common experiences, and network with other startup/new small businesses and suppliers to these businesses

. fulfill their employee needs by posting job ads and searching resumes posted on our site

StartupBuys.com provides to suppliers of goods and services to startup/new small businesses, a cost effective web platform to:

. promote their business by being listed in our nationwide, local searchable, directory which is only accessible by our premium startup/new business members and other suppliers to these businesses

. view the business sourcing needs posted by our premium startup/new small businesses and offer your goods and services to them through our Sourcing section

. promote their businesses by posting relevant blogs

. get/give business advice, share information and common experiences, and network with other startup/new small businesses and other suppliers to these businesses

. promote their businesses by organizing and attending relevant events

. share information and consequently promote their business by posting relevant blogs

StartupBuys.com provides to consumers:

. Great coupon deals and promotions from startup/new small businesses nationwide and right in your area

. An opportunity to get the coupon that you want by using our Suggest a Coupon feature

. An opportunity to network with friends and colleagues and meet new people by participating in group coupon events . An opportunity to search for jobs on our site from startup/new small businesses and to post your resume for potential viewing and hiring by our business members . An opportunity to attend events of interest to you, in your area . An opportunity to find in our directory and support, startup/new small businesses in your local area and throughout the nation . An opportunity for you to make an impact on the success of startup/new small businesses whether in your local area or not, which could, in the aggregate, make a significant impact on the local, state and national economy and employment rate

How we are different from Group Coupon sites

Group coupons are just one of the many features and benefits of our site.

Our members can create and post not only group coupons, but 5 different kinds of â€œregularâ€ coupons plus Deals of the Day, Deals of the Week and Deals of the Month which do not have to be/but can be group coupons.

All of the coupons on our site are exclusively from new (less than 4 years old), small (less than 100 employees) businesses that likely have the greatest incentive to offer the biggest discounts, best bargains and most savings for consumers.

We have a â€œSuggest a Couponâ€ feature whereby people interested in partaking in a group coupon from a particular business, can request one from that business.

Most other group coupon sites usually take anywhere from 50-90% of each coupon sale. We realize that itâ€™s hard enough for a new, small business to succeed. Thatâ€™s why we do not take any portion of the proceeds derived from any coupon offerings by our members.

In addition to our coupon section, we have a multitude of other features including our Directory section, Sourcing section, Networking (Q&A and Groups) section, Jobs (Job Board & Resumes) section, Events section, and Blogs section. Please see our Memberships page for all of the features and benefits of our site.
